talkedWithParents.title: Talked with parents during session (for children)

noSuicidalIdeation.title: No Suicidal Ideation, Homicidal Ideation, Auditory Hallucination, Visual Hallucination

alertAndOriented.title: Alert and Oriented to Person, Place and Time

normalInRate.title: Normal in Rate, Rhythm, Tone, Volume, Quality, and Quantity

noEvidenceSuicidal.title: No Evidence of Suicidal Ideation Homicidal Ideation, Intent or Plan

noEvidenceParanoid.title: No Evidence of Paranoid Ideation or Delusions

passiveSuicidalIdeation.title: Passive Suicidal Ideation With no Intent/Plan

noAuditory.title: No Auditory, Visual, Tactile, Olfactory Hallucinations or Internal Preoccupations

indicationsRisksDiscussed.title: Indications, risks, benefits of medication, alternatives (including no treatment) of treatment discussed with patient at this visit

patientIndicatedUnderstandingWRes.title: Patient indicated understanding with the following reservations:

lossOfApetiteAndOthers.title: Loss of appetite, difficulty sleeping, tics, upset stomach, headache, activation/anxiety, increased blood pressure/pulse, sudden cardiac death, psychosis, disinhibition, suicidal ideation, lowered seizure threshold

increasedSuicidalThoughts.title: Increased suicidal thoughts, mania, sexual side effects, upset stomach, diarrhea, nausea/vomiting, activation/anxiety, headache, insomnia

metabolicChanges.title: Metabolic changes including risk of hypertension, Diabetes mellitus, Hyperlipidemia, cardiac changes, weight gain

lowEnergyFatigue.title: Low energy, fatigue, or excessive sleepiness

negativeInteractionAlcohol.title: Negative interaction with alcohol and illicit drugs

iStopCheckPerformed.title: I-Stop prescription monitoring program check performed:

iStopCheckNotPerformed.title: I-Stop prescription monitoring program check not performed:

noControlledSubstance.title: No controlled substance prescribed at this visit

clientGuardianAgrees.title: Client and/or legal guardian agrees with medication plan above (including if no medications)

call911.title: Patient instructed to call 911 or go to the nearest ER if has thoughts of harming self or others, worsening symptoms, or is unable to care for self

greaterTimeEducation.title: Greater than 50% time was spent in education, counseling, explanation of Diagnosis/Treatment and / or coordination of care

agreesToInstructions.title: Patient agrees to follow these instructions:
